sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="createUser()" #form="ngForm">
  <label>Name:</label>
  <input [(ngModel)]="user.name" name="name" required />

  <label>Email:</label>
  <input [(ngModel)]="user.email" name="email" required />

  <button type="submit" [disabled]="form.invalid">Create User</button>
</form>
